name: Mirrored World (MateG_)
description:
Mirror the levels to get to the goal in Mirrored World, a puzzle-platformer protoype created for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 148.

Theme: Mirror.

Current content: 8 levels :J

Controls:

  • In the menu: 
    • UP-DOWN to navigate through the menu.
    • SPACE to select.
  • In the game:
    • LEFT-RIGHT to move.
    • SPACE to jump.
    • UP to flip the levels!
